This page is for support, compliance, and general enquiries related to the UK Locksmith Directory platform. For emergency locksmith assistance, please return to our Emergency Hub. For all other matters, please select the appropriate channel below.

The UK Locksmith Directory is owned and operated by Visible Solutions LLC. For inquiries regarding corporate governance, data privacy, or international data transfer under UK GDPR, please use the 'Disputes & Governance' channel below.
For assistance with the website interface, reporting inaccurate listing data, reporting site bugs, or providing general feedback on your browsing experience.
Assistance regarding account access, billing history, or verification status updates. Please note that subscription modifications must be handled via your account portal.
Formal complaints about a provider, data erasure requests (Right to be Forgotten), and regulatory inquiries. We aim to acknowledge all governance enquiries within 2–3 business days.
Report a concern or data inquiry
For media inquiries or partnership proposals not related to directory listings.

This policy explains how the UK Locksmith Directory uses cookies and similar technologies. By using our platform, you acknowledge our use of essential cookies and can manage your preferences for analytical and marketing tracking.

The UK Locksmith Directory is a comprehensive digital index and lead-routing platform owned and operated by Visible Solutions LLC. We provide the technological infrastructure and marketing tools that allow independent UK locksmiths to connect with local customers.
US Digital Marketing Agency & Software Provider
Directory management, SaaS tools for locksmiths, and consumer routing

While Visible Solutions LLC provides marketing services to locksmiths, our verification and trust standards remain absolute. A locksmith's status as a 'Member' or 'Service Subscriber' does not bypass our mandatory identity and credentials checks.

For inquiries regarding corporate governance, data privacy, or legal matters, please direct your correspondence to our administrative team at Visible Solutions LLC. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to understand how we handle data transfer between the UK and our US-based infrastructure in compliance with relevant regulations.

## Who we are

Visible Solutions LLC is a US-based digital marketing agency specializing in high-performance directory solutions and lead generation for the trades. We operate this platform as an independent bridge, ensuring UK consumers have access to verified local locksmiths through a modern, AI-enhanced interface.

## What we do

We provide Directory Services for consumers and Marketing & SaaS Services for locksmith members. We provide the tools—including listings management, review aggregation, and secure quote routing—that enable local professionals to manage their digital presence effectively in an increasingly competitive market.

## Our Role in the UK Market

We act as a neutral technology provider. We are not a locksmith chain, and we do not employ locksmiths directly. Our responsibility is to maintain the integrity of the data and the efficiency of the routing technology. We exist to facilitate the connection, not to perform the physical labor.

This Privacy Policy explains how Visible Solutions LLC collects, uses, and protects your personal data. This policy applies to all visitors to our website, consumers using our routing tools to find locksmith services, and independent locksmith businesses listed on our platform.

## Data Controller Identification

For the purposes of the UK General Data Protection Regulation (UK GDPR) and the Data Protection Act 2018, the Data Controller is:

**Visible Solutions LLC**  
A company registered in Delaware, United States  
Email: privacy@uklocksmithdirectory.co.uk

**UK REPRESENTATIVE FOR GDPR PURPOSES**  
[UK Rep Name / Service Placeholder]  
[Address Line 1]  
London, UK

---

## 1. Data Collection

We collect data to facilitate the connection between consumers and locksmiths. The data collected depends on your interaction with our platform:

### Website Visitors
We collect technical data including IP address, browser type, operating system, and interaction data via cookies to ensure site security and performance.

### Consumers
When you use our routing tools, we may process your partial postcode, phone number, and call metadata (time and duration of call to Service Providers) to enable service connection.

### Locksmith Partners
We collect business verification documents including DBS checks, insurance certificates, trading addresses, and billing information.

---

## 2. Legal Bases for Processing

Under UK GDPR, we rely on the following legal bases to process your personal data:

### Contractual Necessity
Processing required to fulfil our terms of service, such as routing your call to a local locksmith or managing a locksmith's business listing.

### Legitimate Interests
Processing necessary for fraud prevention, network security, and maintaining the integrity of our directory.

---

## 3. International Data Transfers

### Important Notice: Data Storage Location
Visible Solutions LLC is based in the United States. Your data will be transferred to and processed on servers located in the United States.

We acknowledge that the United States has different data protection laws than the United Kingdom. To ensure your data remains protected to UK standards, we utilize the following safeguards:

### Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)
We implement the UK International Data Transfer Addendum to the EU Commission Standard Contractual Clauses for transfers of data to our US infrastructure.

### UK–US Data Bridge
Where applicable, we align our processing activities with the principles of the UK-US Data Bridge framework to ensure adequate protection.

---

## 4. Your Rights

You have specific rights regarding your personal data under UK law:

- **Right of Access**: You may request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
- **Right to Rectification**: You may ask us to correct data that is inaccurate or incomplete.
- **Right to Erasure**: Also known as the "Right to be Forgotten," you may ask us to delete your data under certain circumstances.
- **Right to Portability**: You may request to receive your data in a structured, commonly used machine-readable format.

To exercise any of these rights, please submit a Data Subject Access Request (DSAR) via our Contact Page.

---

## 5. Complaints

If you believe we have not processed your data in accordance with the law, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the UK Information Commissioner's Office (ICO).

**Information Commissioner's Office**  
Wycliffe House, Water Lane  
Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF  
Helpline: 0303 123 1113  
Website: www.ico.org.uk

---

## 6. Data Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

- **Consumer Call Data**: Retained for 12 months for service quality and dispute resolution
- **Website Analytics**: Retained for 24 months for performance analysis
- **Locksmith Business Data**: Retained for the duration of their listing plus 6 years for accounting purposes

---

## 7. Cookies and Tracking

We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. For more information, please see our Cookie Policy.

---

## 8. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website or by email if you have provided us with your contact details.

---

## 9. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:

**Email**: privacy@uklocksmithdirectory.co.uk  
**Phone**: [Contact Number]  
**Address**: [Registered Office Address]

Professional service. Replaced my front door lock. Good quality work but arrived slightly later than the original slot due to traffic. Kept me informed though.

Based in Edgbaston, Brum City Security has provided residential locksmith services across Birmingham since 2014. Owned and operated by Mark Thompson, the business specializes in non-destructive entry and uPVC door mechanism failures.

Unlike national call centers, you speak directly to the locksmith who will attend your property. Mark carries stock for 90% of common lock types (Yale, Era, Avocet, etc.) to ensure most jobs are completed in a single visit.

The company holds valid DBS checks (updated annually) and Public Liability Insurance covering up to £5 million.
